Detailed Description

Class for the main laser filter node.

Limits the angle of a laserscan topic "scan" and publishes on topic based on rosparam "scan_topic".

Definition at line 18 of file laser_scan_filter.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LaserFilter::LaserFilter ( )

Laser class constructor.

Initiates laserscan subscribing/advertising, reads rosparams, and sets static pose of laser.
